forecast.name: Tonight

forecast.name: Wednesday

weather_report:
As the sun retreats behind the horizon, Downtown San Francisco reveals the last shimmering hints of daylight, transitioning to a cool, inviting evening. The skies remain mostly clear, with a gentle southwest breeze whispering through the city, creating a serene atmosphere that beckons for an evening stroll. The anticipated low temperature hovers comfortably around fifty-four degrees, allowing for a light jacket or sweater to wrap around your shoulders as you embrace the fresh air.

Tomorrow promises a delightful respite with sunny skies and promising warmth, inviting you out to bask in the glow of a high nearing sixty-nine. The winds may stir a bit, lending a playful gust to your day, perfect for an afternoon at the park or a leisurely cycle along the waterfront. It’s a day painted with potential for activities that revel in simplicity—perhaps exploring the local artisanal markets or leisurely sipping coffee at a sun-drenched café. Such clarity enjoys a splendid kiss of sunshine, overshadowing any remnants of morning fog. If adventure calls, one may find solace in a hike towards the hills for a panoramic view, tracing the contours of the bay as the day unfolds.
